ch0282_10_ballguy/0101_0701_01_10:
I’ve been waiting for you to roll by and say
hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0282_10_ballguy/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ll keep doing my best to make my dreams
come true!
ch0282_10_ballguy/7101_0701_01_10:
Let me teach you how to tell the difference
between a Poké Ball and a Voltorb!
ch0282_10_ballguy/7101_0701_02_10:
If it shocks you when you touch it, it’s a
Voltorb!
ch0282_10_ballguy/7101_0701_03_10:
Oh, you want to know how to tell without
touching it?
ch0282_10_ballguy/7102_0701_01_10:
To become a mascot, you’ve got to have
stamina!
ch0282_10_ballguy/7102_0701_02_10:
Lately, I’ve been training with the
Masked Royal and Crasher Wake!
ch0282_10_ballguy/7103_0701_01_10:
I heard Steven’s the son of the
Devon Corporation president.
ch0282_10_ballguy/7103_0701_02_10:
If I became friends with him, do you think I
could get them to make a Ball Guy–original
Poké Ball?
ch0282_10_ballguy/7104_0701_01_10: I’m extra motivated thanks to my sygna suit!
ch0282_10_ballguy/7104_0701_02_10:
If you ever need a little cheer or help with
Pokémon battles, you can count on your
mate—the Ball Guy!
ch0282_10_ballguy/7105_0701_01_10:
I’ve got a favor to ask of you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0282_10_ballguy/7105_0701_02_10:
Could you train with me? I’m trying to get
better at Pokémon battles.
ch0282_10_ballguy/7105_0701_03_10:
I have to get stronger—so I can support
everyone else!
ch0282_10_ballguy/1701_0701_01_10:
Hey there! Thanks for rolling by to have a
chat with your mate—the Ball Guy!
ch0282_10_ballguy/1701_0701_02_10:
Since you love Pokémon so much, let me
give you a wonderful gift!
ch0282_10_ballguy/2501_0701_01_10:
Most of the Poké Balls we use are
mass-produced in large factories...
ch0282_10_ballguy/2501_0701_02_10:
but there are also amazing smiths who can
handcraft them using incredi-ball techniques!
ch0282_10_ballguy/2501_0701_03_10:
There aren’t too many Poké Ball crafters
nowadays, though, so handcrafted balls
are truly valua-ball!
ch0282_10_ballguy/2501_0702_01_10:
Whoa! You know people here on Pasio who
can handcraft Poké Balls?
ch0282_10_ballguy/2501_0702_03_10:
I must learn from them while I’m here
on Pasio!
ch0282_10_ballguy/2511_0701_01_10:
Thanks to my hard work here on Pasio,
I’m becoming more recogniza-ball!
Everyone’s been rolling by to say hi!
ch0282_10_ballguy/2511_0701_02_10:
Every day, I’m busy cheering for everyone!
But it helps them out, so I can’t complain!
ch0282_10_ballguy/2511_0702_01_10:
If I stay on the ball, one day I’ll finally be
recognized as an official mascot!
ch0282_10_ballguy/2511_0702_02_10:
It won’t be long until I’m a true mascot for
any generation!
ch0282_10_ballguy/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! You sure are lucky to see
me first thing this morning!
ch0282_10_ballguy/3003_0701_01_10:
Are you on your lunch break, too? Let’s take
it easy and roll with the flow!
ch0282_10_ballguy/3005_0701_01_10:
Sweet dreams tonight! Speaking of dreams,
you know about Dream Balls, right?
